data.name: RES_ExceptionStoreConfigNotFound
data.value: The store application configuration section isn´t configured. Check the /configuration/appParams node in the application config file (assemblyfilename.config or web.config).

data.name: RES_ExceptionStoreConfigConnection
data.value: Can´t get connection string from store application configuration. Check the /configuration/appParams node in the application config file (assemblyfilename.config or web.config). This node must be like <add key="ConnectionString" value="server=localhost;database=;trusted_connection=yes">

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantGetCustomer
data.value: Can´t get the specified customer. Customer {0}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantGetProduct
data.value: Can´t get the specified product. Product {0}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantGetTaskByCustomerID
data.value: Can´t get the specified task. Customer ID {0}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantGetTaskByTaskID
data.value: Can´t get the specified task. Task ID {0}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantCreateTask
data.value: Can´t create task with the specified params. Customer logon {0}, task {1}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantUpdateTask
data.value: Can´t update the task with the specified params. Customer logon {0}, task {1}

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantCreateOrder
data.value: Can´t create an order with the specified params.

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantCreateOrderItem
data.value: Can´t create order item with the specified params.

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantDeleteProduct
data.value: Can´t delete the product with the specified id.

data.name: RES_ExceptionCantUpdateProduct
data.value: Can´t update the product with the specified id.
